Posts.Content: I don’t know whether to sing from the tree tops that my right breast and lymph nodes are going today or curl up in a ball because I am so scared of the unknown, have to be in hospital by 7am this morning, well I am all packed ready, missing my cup of tea though  well everyone have a nice day. And I will catch up in a couple of days
Posts.Title: Operation day

Posts.Content: Morning all, came home yesterday, so only spent 1 night in hospital, the pain isn’t to bad just feel uncomfortable because of the drains, must admit won’t be sorry to see them gone, got home visit today, then they will phone each day to check everything's ok, not sure what happens after that, nobody has told me anything which 8 find a bit strange take care all, hav3 a good day
Posts.Title: Operation day
